China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2023 年 12 月 24 日星期日 19:13:30 GMT 120
Beijing breaks a seven-decade cold-weather recordSome areas in the northeast hit -40 degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit as biting cold air flowed from the Arctic. A Beijing observatory recorded more than 300 hours of below-freezing temperatures since Dec. 11. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 06:56:38 GMT EQ2PK257VFNMZHFBUGZ7QMUVKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-henan-province-hit-by-shortage-winter-heating-after-cold-wave-2023-12-24/Reuters世界中国
Indonesia nickel smelter furnace fire kills 13 workers, injures 46Thirteen workers were killed and 46 injured on Sunday in a fire at a nickel smelter furnace owned by Indonesia Tsingshan Stainless Steel (ITSS) on Sulawesi island, the owner of the industrial park where the smelter is located said. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 05:39:58 GMT NAYLHGIGX5JYXF5R277HP7EHUI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/smelter-furnace-blast-kills-12-indonesias-morowali-nickel-induscial-park-media-2023-12-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
Aloisi leaves Brisbane Roar to pursue 'overseas opportunity'Brisbane Roar announced the departure of Ross Aloisi from the role of head coach on Sunday, saying the former midfielder has left the club to take on an "overseas opportunity". Sun, 24 Dec 2023 02:15:14 GMT UOGR3ECPDFN3PLT6N3CAZYBUSU https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/aloisi-leaves-brisbane-roar-pursue-overseas-opportunity-2023-12-24/Reuters运动的足球
Taiwan says eight Chinese fighter jets crossed strait's median lineTaiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday that over the previous 24 hours it had detected eight Chinese fighter jets crossing over the median line of the Taiwan Strait, as well as one Chinese balloon. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 01:38:05 GMT E522UENKYFLWVDLDOMJ3HYGLT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-says-eight-chinese-fighter-jets-crossed-straits-median-line-2023-12-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
India arrests two senior employees of Chinese firm Vivo, source saysIndia's financial crime-fighting agency has arrested two senior employees working for Chinese smartphone maker Vivo's India unit, a source directly involved with the case said on Saturday, which the company vowed to challenge legally. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 17:14:12 GMT NLLTQ6LBCRNUNCVRXYE62X27SI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-arrests-two-senior-employees-chinese-firm-vivo-source-2023-12-23/Reuters世界印度
Taiwan reports more Chinese military activity as election approachesTaiwan reported Chinese warplanes and warships around the island on Saturday, including aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait, as Beijing continues military activities with three weeks to go before Taiwan votes. Sat, 23 Dec 2023 07:30:17 GMT ZRHJG3TN6VPXPNFYGVUXOE34OU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/taiwan-reports-more-chinese-military-activity-election-approaches-2023-12-23/Reuters世界中国
